descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][color=#000000][size=6]Ebony Standalone Follower[/size][/color][/font][/center]
<br />
<br />[font=Tahoma]Ebony is a young imperial woman who traveled to Skyrim in search for her brother, although her brother is missing from where she said they would meet, she's still persistent in traveling more of Skyrim in search of him. The quest pack will be coming soon (it's being perfected). The quest pack will include [i]new weapons[/i] [b](swords, maces, etc)[/b], [i]new armors[/i] [b](female & male)[/b], [i]new dungeons[/i] [b](multiple)[/b] and a lot more of interesting new ideas to Skyrim. The quest pack will be based on you helping out Ebony in her search for her brother. She knows he used to live in Windhelm but during the search you uncover things relating to the disappearance of her brother.[/font]
author: DMTMods
